        public void legend(int goalHuePos,

        Draws the legend at the bottom of the screen.
        Parameters:
        goalHuePos - current position, be that note or threshold level, in this Module's menu.colorSelect

      • okGoLegend

        public void okGoLegend(int goalHuePos,
                       int inputNum)
        Draws the legend at the bottom of the screen.
        Parameters:
        goalHuePos - current position, be that note or threshold level, in this Module's menu.colorSelect

      • getLegendText

        public java.lang.String[] getLegendText()
        Default value is the current scale, but a Module can override this for its own use.
        Returns:
        String[] of text to display in each position of the legend;

      • getScaleDegree

        public int getScaleDegree(int inputNum)
        Returns the scale degree (0 to 11) of the note currently being sung into the given input line.
        Parameters:
        inputNum - number indicating which input to get the note from
        Returns:
        the scale degree of the note currently being sung into that input

        Returns:

      • setTrichromColor1

        public void setTrichromColor1(int inputNum,
                              int red,
                              int green,
                              int blue)
        Set the first color of the scale and makes a trichromatic spectrum between that, the 4th and the 8th colors of the scale.
        Parameters:
        inputNum - input to be affected
        red - red value of the color
        green - green value of the color
        blue - blue value of the color

      • setTrichromColor2

        public void setTrichromColor2(int inputNum,
                              int red,

                              int blue)

        Parameters:

        red - red value of the color
        green - green value of the color
        blue - blue value of the color

        public void setDichromColor1(int inputNum,
                             int red,
                             int green,
                             int blue)

        inputNum - input to be affected
        red - red value of the color
        green - green value of the color
        blue - blue value of the color

        blue - blue value of the color

      • setColor

        public void setColor(int scaleDegree,
                     int inputNum)

      • setAttack

        public void setAttack(int inputNum,
                      int attackVal)
        Set the attack value for this particular input to the given value (that is, the time that it will take for a new color to come fully).
        Parameters:
        inputNum - The input whose attack value is being changed
        attackVal - The new attack value

      • setRelease

        public void setRelease(int inputNum,
                       int releaseVal)
        Set the release value for this particular input to the given value (that is, the time that it will take for each color to fade away).
        Parameters:
        inputNum - The input whose release value is being changed
        releaseVal - The new release value
